name: Rex the Retro Oscilobot
description: Rex is a unique robot member of the WebtrES club. With its oscilloscope-themed design, it stands out among its fellow robots. Its cat-shaped box body is equipped with soldier arms and legs, allowing it to move with precision and agility. The retro console buttons on its chest provide a nostalgic touch, while the snake screen serves as its display, showcasing various waveforms and data. Rex's helmet addon enhances its overall functionality and protection.
